title: Click loot causes bugsplat
body:
10/10 reproduction rate.
Title basically.
I have 140 tokens and all my friends do to ( 6 of us) and all of us are bug-splatting.

PROBLEM : https://puu.sh/wpTr1/ef431a2b09.mp4

replies.body: Hey^^ Same issue here. Using the repair tool seems to have cleaned it up!

Thanks for the video, that helps a ton!  You might have some bad game assets that's causing you to crash out.  My suggestion here would be to start with a repair!  You can quickly do this by downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and a force repatch.  Let me know if that works for you!
